name: Chainsaw Survivor PC
description:
If you like action games then this game is for you.

Monsters have invaded the world, you must survive using your chainsaw and the various equipment that are at your disposal.
You must also protect your home and be careful to extinguish fires caused by monsters.
Good luck and get the best score to be the best in this action game.
You will be able to publish your score in a world ranking and see your rank.
